caption.title: LOO cross-validation results for the dry season and wet season using the standardized under-5 diarrhea data and correlation as the metric of prediction accuracy.
caption.p: The rows represent the seasonal data that were used to fit the model. The columns indicate the omitted year, which was also used to test model prediction accuracy. Table values represent the correlation of the averaged model prediction with the observation for the omitted year.
Click here for additional data file.
